name: Exmania
description:
Survive a hectic endless alien space battle by avoiding and shooting down slimey invaders.

Controls:
Joystick movement on left side
Fire button right

Hold Fire button to charge a supershot.
Only supershot can kill green enemy.
Avoid enemy hits to get combo, restore more life and get triple shot.

Third-party resources:

  • Game engine - Unity 5.6.2 
  • Sounds - sfxr
  • Song - Rhinoceros Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License, http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
